檍字的基本解释

檍
yì
古书上说的一种树，木材坚韧，可做弓弩等：“凡取幹之道七，柘为上，檍次之。”

檍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》於力切，入職，影。］
木名。又名木橿、万年木。可作弓材。

檍字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檍； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第24
【廣韻】於力切【集韻】【韻會】乙力切，?音億。【說文】杶也。可爲弓材。【周禮·冬官考工記】弓人取幹之道，柘爲上，檍次之。【爾雅·釋木】杻，檍。【郭註】似棣，細葉。【陸璣·隰有杻疏】名萬歲樹。取億萬之義。　【韻會】或作?。　又【集韻】【類篇】?于記切，音意。義同。

考證：〔【周禮·冬官考工記】工人取幹之道，柘爲上，檍次之。〕　謹照原文工人改弓人。
檍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檍字的起名意思

木名。又名木橿﹑万年木。可作弓材。

檍
Basic explanation of words
檍
yì
The ancient book said that the wood is tough and can be used for bows and crossbows: "The seven ways to take the stem, the first is the first, and the second is the second."
檍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guang Yun" Yu Liqie, entry, film. ]
Wooden name. Also known as Muxie, Wannianmu. Can be used as bow material.
檍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檍; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 556 24
[Guang Yun] Yu Liqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yi Liqie,? Yinyi billion. [Said the text] Yeah. Can be bow material. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The best way for the archer to take advantage of it is the first one, and the second one. 【Erya·Shimu】杻，檍. [Guo's Note] Like Di, thin leaves. 【Lu Ji·Xian Youshushu】It is named Long Live Tree. Take billions of meanings.　【Rhyme Club】Or make?.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Yu Jiqie, Yinyi. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The best way for workers to get their work done is first and second. 〕　I would like to change the worker to the bowman according to the original text.
檍
